00048 bool
00049 StatsGen::readFromDataset(char *dataset, char *output)
00050 {
00051     
00052     getTime(&t1);
00053     cout.precision(4);
00054     
00055     string line;
00056     int ntriples=0;
00057     
00058     // Input File/Pipe management
00059     FILE *filePipe;
00060     std::string pipeCommand;
00061     istream *input;
00062     ifstream *fileStream = NULL; 
00063     boost::fdistream *pipeStream = NULL;
00064     
00065     // RDF Parser
00066     RDFSyntaxMediator rdfmediator;
00067     DictionaryTriples dictionaryTriples;
00068     
00069     t_encoding = PLAIN;
00070     mapping = MAPPING1;
00071     parsing = PSO;
00072     
00073     // Performing HDT on the set of properties
00074     // ***************************************
00075     
00076     // 1) Opening the dataset
00077     string datasetName(dataset);
00078     
00079     if(stringHasEnding(datasetName, ".gz")) {
00080         pipeCommand = "gunzip -c ";
00081     } else if(stringHasEnding(datasetName, ".bz2")) {
00082         pipeCommand = "bunzip2 -c ";
00083     } 
00084     
00085     if(pipeCommand.length()>0) {
00086         pipeCommand.append(datasetName);
00087         
00088         if ((filePipe=popen(pipeCommand.c_str(),"r")) == NULL) {
00089             throw "popen() failed";
00090         }
00091         
00092         input = pipeStream = new boost::fdistream(fileno(filePipe));
00093     } else {        
00094         input = fileStream = new ifstream(datasetName.c_str());
00095     }
00096     if (!input->good())
00097     {
00098         cout << "   <ERROR> Please check the dataset in " << datasetName << endl;
00099         return false;
00100     }
00101     
00102     // 2) Testing dictionary options: it is built on a first pass
00103     //    which gathers statistics and performs the chosen ordering.
00104     //    First, the ordering parameter is retrieved and next the
00105     //    chosen dictionary class is instantiated.
00106     getTime(&t2);
00107     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Building Dictionary from " << datasetName << endl;
00108     
00109     // New plain dictionary with the by default size.
00110     dictionary = new PlainDictionary();
00111     
00112     // Parse
00113     if (1)
00114     {
00115         node = new string[3];
00116         
00117         while (getline(*input,line))
00118         {
00119             //cout << "> " << line << endl;
00120             ntriples++;
00121             parseTripleN3(line);
00122             dictionary->checkTriple(node);
00123         }
00124     } else {
00125         dictionaryTriples.dictionary = dictionary;
00126         dictionaryTriples.triples = NULL;
00127         dictionaryTriples.ntriples= new int();
00128         *dictionaryTriples.ntriples=0;
00129         rdfmediator.parsing(const_cast<char*> (dataset),dictionaryTriples);
00130         ntriples = *dictionaryTriples.ntriples;
00131     }
00132     
00133     // 3) Sorting Dictionary (LEXICOGRAPHIC)
00134     //    Retrieve the id mapping choice
00135     getTime(&t2);
00136     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Split Dictionary" << endl;
00137     
00138     dictionary->split();
00139     
00140     // 3) Sorting Dictionary (LEXICOGRAPHIC)
00141     //    Retrieve the id mapping choice
00142     getTime(&t2);
00143     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Sorting Dictionary" << endl;
00144     
00145     
00146     dictionary->lexicographicSort(mapping);
00147     
00148     
00149     // 4) Testing triples options: it is built on a second pass.
00150     //    The graph parsing is retrieved and the object is 
00151     //    instantiated by according with the encoding choice. The
00152     //    resultant structure is finally sorted on parsing choice.
00153     getTime(&t2);
00154     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Building Triples" << endl;
00155     
00156     // Needed?
00157     if(pipeCommand.length()>0) { // Cannot seek on pipes
00158         // Close old pipe
00159         delete pipeStream;
00160         pclose(filePipe);
00161         
00162         // Create new one from the begining
00163         if ((filePipe=popen(pipeCommand.c_str(),"r")) == NULL) {
00164             throw "popen() failed";
00165         }
00166         
00167         input = pipeStream = new boost::fdistream(fileno(filePipe));
00168         
00169     } else {
00170         input->clear();
00171         input->seekg (0, ios::beg);
00172     }
00173     
00174     // PLAIN triples
00175     triples = new PlainTriples(dictionary, ntriples, parsing);
00176     
00177     
00178     // COMPACT triples  
00179     //triples = new CompactTriples(dictionary, ntriples, parsing);
00180     //t_encoding = COMPACT;
00181     
00182     // BITMAP triples   
00183     //triples = new BitmapTriples(dictionary, ntriples, parsing);
00184     //t_encoding = BITMAP;
00185     
00186     
00187     int subject, predicate, object;
00188     
00189     if (1)
00190     {
00191         while (getline(*input,line)) 
00192         {
00193             parseTripleN3(line);
00194             
00195             subject = dictionary->retrieveID(node[0], VOC_SUBJECT);
00196             predicate = dictionary->retrieveID(node[1], VOC_PREDICATE);
00197             object = dictionary->retrieveID(node[2], VOC_OBJECT);
00198             
00199             triples->insert(subject, predicate, object);
00200             
00201             //          cout << subject << "," << predicate << "," << object <<endl;
00202         }   
00203     } else {
00204         rdfmediator;
00205         dictionaryTriples.triples = triples;
00206         rdfmediator.parsing(const_cast<char*> (dataset),dictionaryTriples);
00207         
00208     }
00209     ntriples = triples->size();
00210     
00211     getTime(&t2);
00212     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Sort triples" << endl;
00213     
00214     triples->graphSort();
00215     
00216     // 6) Writing Dictionary
00217     getTime(&t2);
00218     int separator = '\n';
00219     string dictPath(output);
00220     dictPath.append("/hdt");
00221     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Writing Dictionary to: " << dictPath << endl;
00222     
00223     mkpathfile(dictPath.c_str(),0744);
00224     dictionary->write(dictPath, separator);
00225     
00226     // 7) Writing Triples
00227     //    Returns the number of triples effectively writen (note
00228     //    that the original dataset can contain repeated triples)
00229     getTime(&t2);
00230     string triplePath(output);
00231     triplePath.append("/hdt");
00232     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Writing Triples to " << triplePath << endl;
00233     ntriples = triples->write(triplePath);
00234     
00235     // 8) Writing Header
00236     getTime(&t2);
00237     string headerPath(output);
00238     headerPath.append("/hdt");
00239     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Writing Header to " << headerPath << endl;
00240     
00241     header = new Header(parsing, mapping, separator, t_encoding, 
00242                         dictionary->getNsubjects(), dictionary->getNpredicates(), dictionary->getNobjects(), dictionary->getSsubobj(),
00243                         ntriples, dictionary->getNLiterals(), dictionary->getMaxID());
00244     header->write(headerPath);
00245         
00246     // Close
00247     if(pipeCommand.length()>0) {
00248         delete pipeStream;
00249         input = NULL;
00250         pclose(filePipe);
00251     } else {
00252         fileStream->close();
00253         delete fileStream;
00254         input = NULL;   
00255     }
00256     
00257     delete [] node;
00258     
00259     return true;
00260 }
00261 
00262 bool
00263 StatsGen::readFromHDT(char *hdt, char*output)
00264 {
00265     DataTime t1, t2;
00266     getTime(&t1);
00267     cout.precision(4);
00268     
00269     cout << "[" << showpoint << t1.user - t1.user << "]  Loading HDT" << endl;
00270     
00271     getTime(&t2);
00272     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Reading Header from: " << hdt << endl;
00273     header = new Header();
00274     header->read(hdt);
00275     
00276     getTime(&t2);
00277     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Loading Dictionary from: " << hdt << endl;
00278     
00279     int mapping = header->getMapping();
00280     
00281     dictionary = new PlainDictionary(hdt, mapping, header->getD_separator(), header->getNsubjects(), header->getNpredicates(), header->getNobjects(), header->getSsubobj());
00282     
00283     getTime(&t2);
00284     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Loading Triples from: " << hdt << endl;
00285     switch(header->getT_encoding())
00286     {
00287         case PLAIN:
00288             triples = new PlainTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(), header->getParsing(), hdt);
00289             break;
00290         case COMPACT:
00291             triples = new CompactTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(), header->getParsing(), hdt);
00292             break;
00293         case BITMAP:
00294             triples = new BitmapTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(), header->getParsing(), hdt);
00295             break;
00296         case K2TREE:
00297             cout << "   <WARNING> K2-tree Triples encoding is not currently supported" << endl;
00298             return false;
00299             break;
00300         default:
00301             cout << "   <ERROR> Current triples encoding  is not supported" << endl;
00302             return false;
00303     }
00304     
00305     triples->loadGraphMemory();
00306     
00307     getTime(&t2);
00308     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "] HDT Succesfully loaded" << endl;
00309     
00310     return true;
00311 }
00312 
00313 bool 
00314 StatsGen::process(char *output)
00315 {   
00316     // Save parsings
00317     for(int pars=1;pars<=6;pars++) {
00318         triples->convertParsing(pars);
00319         
00320         getTime(&t2);
00321         string plainPath(output);
00322         plainPath.append("/hdt_");
00323         plainPath.append(parsingTypeStr[pars]);
00324         plainPath.append("_plain");
00325         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Saving PlainTriples on " << plainPath << endl;
00326         PlainTriples::write(triples->getGraph(), plainPath);
00327         
00328         getTime(&t2);
00329         string compactPath(output);
00330         compactPath.append("/hdt_");
00331         compactPath.append(parsingTypeStr[pars]);
00332         compactPath.append("_compact");
00333         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Saving CompactTriples on " << compactPath << endl;
00334         CompactTriples::write(triples->getGraph(), compactPath);
00335         
00336         getTime(&t2);
00337         string bitmapPath(output);
00338         bitmapPath.append("/hdt_");
00339         bitmapPath.append(parsingTypeStr[pars]);
00340         bitmapPath.append("_bitmap");
00341         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Saving BitmapTriples on " << bitmapPath << endl;
00342         BitmapTriples::write(triples->getGraph(), bitmapPath);
00343     }
00344         
00345     // 9) Checking optional gnuplot generation
00346     triples->convertParsing(PSO);
00347     string gnuplotPath(output);
00348     gnuplotPath.append("/nocluster/");
00349     mkpathfile(gnuplotPath.c_str(), 0744);
00350     
00351     getTime(&t2);
00352     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Generating Gnuplot on " << gnuplotPath << endl;
00353     
00354     int max = dictionary->getMaxID();
00355     int npredicates = dictionary->getNpredicates();
00356     vector <string> predicates(npredicates+1);
00357     
00358     for (int i = 1; i<=npredicates; i++)
00359     {
00360         string p = dictionary->retrieveString(i, VOC_PREDICATE);
00361         predicates[i] = p;
00362     }
00363     triples->gnuplot(npredicates, predicates, max, gnuplotPath.c_str());
00364     
00365     // 11) Cluster
00366     triples->convertParsing(PSO);
00367     getTime(&t2);
00368     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Clustering" << endl;
00369     triples->clustering();
00370     
00371     // 12) Writing Dictionary
00372     getTime(&t2);
00373     string dictPath = output;
00374     dictPath.append("/hdt_cluster");
00375     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Writing Clustered Dictionary to: " << dictPath << endl;
00376     dictionary->write(dictPath, header->getD_separator());
00377     
00378     // 13) Writing Triples
00379     //    Returns the number of triples effectively writen (note
00380     //    that the original dataset can contain repeated triples)
00381     getTime(&t2);
00382     string triplePath = output;
00383     triplePath.append("/hdt_cluster");
00384     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Writing Clustered Triples to " << triplePath << endl;
00385     int ntriples = triples->write(triplePath);
00386     
00387     // 14) Writing Header
00388     getTime(&t2);
00389     string headerPath = output;
00390     headerPath.append("/hdt_cluster");
00391     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Writing Clustered Header to " << headerPath << endl;
00392     
00393 /*  header = new Header(parsing, mapping, separator, t_encoding, 
00394                         dictionary->getNsubjects(), dictionary->getNpredicates(), dictionary->getNobjects(), dictionary->getSsubobj(),
00395                         ntriples, dictionary->getMaxID());*/
00396     header->write(headerPath);
00397     
00398     // 15) Clustered GNUPLOT
00399     gnuplotPath=output;
00400     gnuplotPath.append("/cluster/");
00401     mkpathfile(gnuplotPath.c_str(), 0744);
00402     getTime(&t2);
00403     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Generating Clustered Gnuplot on " << gnuplotPath << endl;
00404     
00405     if(1){
00406         int max = dictionary->getMaxID();
00407         int npredicates = dictionary->getNpredicates();
00408         vector <string> predicates(npredicates+1);
00409         
00410         for (int i = 1; i<=npredicates; i++)
00411         {
00412             string p = dictionary->retrieveString(i, VOC_PREDICATE);
00413             predicates[i] = p;
00414         }
00415         triples->gnuplot(npredicates, predicates, max, gnuplotPath.c_str());
00416     }
00417 
00418     // Dictionary stats
00419     getTime(&t2);
00420     string dictStats(output);
00421     dictStats.append("/dictstats");
00422     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Calculate Dictionary Statistics on " << dictStats <<endl;
00423     mkpathfile((dictStats).c_str(), 0744);
00424     dictionary->dumpStats(dictStats);
00425 
00426     // 10) Degree
00427     getTime(&t2);
00428     string degreePath(output);
00429     degreePath.append("/degree");
00430     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Calculate Degree Metrics on " << degreePath <<endl;
00431     mkpathfile((degreePath).c_str(), 0744);
00432     triples->calculateDegrees(degreePath);
00433     
00434     getTime(&t2);
00435     string predPath(output);
00436     predPath.append("/predicateHistogram");
00437     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Calculate Predicate Histogram on " << predPath <<endl;
00438     mkpathfile((predPath).c_str(), 0744);
00439     triples->convertParsing(PSO);
00440     triples->calculatePredicateHistogram(predPath);
00441     
00442     
00443     // All done
00444     getTime(&t2);
00445     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  All done" << endl;
00446     
00447     return true;
00448 }
00449 
00450 void 
00451 StatsGen::parseTripleN3(string t)
00452 {
00453     string value = t;
00454     int pos = 0;
00455     int firstIndex=0;
00456     int lastIndex=0;
00457     bool errorParsing=false;
00458     
00459     node[0]="";
00460     node[1]="";
00461     node[2]="";
00462     
00463     while (true)
00464     {
00465         value = value.substr(firstIndex);
00466         
00467         if (value=="." || value=="\n" || value == "" || value.at(0)=='#')
00468             break;
00469         
00470         //obvious space 
00471         if (value.at(0)==' ')
00472         {
00473             //do nothing
00474             lastIndex=0; 
00475         }
00476         //URI   
00477         else if (value.at(0)=='<')
00478         {
00479             lastIndex = value.find(">");    
00480             //check size of pos
00481             if (pos>2)
00482             {
00483                 errorParsing=true;  
00484                 break;      
00485             }
00486             node[pos] = value.substr(0,lastIndex+1);
00487             pos++;
00488         }
00489         //Literal  
00490         else if (value.at(0)=='"')
00491         {
00492             lastIndex = value.find('"',1);
00493             //check if literal is escaped
00494             while (true)
00495             {
00496                 bool escaped = false;
00497                 int temp = lastIndex-1;
00498                 
00499                 while (temp>0 && value.at(temp)=='\\')
00500                 {
00501                     if (escaped) escaped=false;
00502                     else escaped = true;
00503                     temp--;
00504                 }
00505                 
00506                 if (!escaped) break;
00507                 lastIndex++;
00508                 if (lastIndex==value.length())
00509                     //Cannot find the (unescaped) end
00510                     errorParsing=true; 
00511                 lastIndex = value.find('"',lastIndex);
00512                 if (lastIndex==string::npos)
00513                     //Cannot find the (unescaped) end
00514                     errorParsing=true;        
00515             } 
00516             
00517             // literal can extend to a bit more than just the ",
00518             // also take into account lang and datatype strings
00519             if (value.at(lastIndex+1) == '@') 
00520             {
00521                 // find end of literal/lang tag
00522                 lastIndex = value.find(' ', lastIndex+1) - 1;
00523             } 
00524             else if (value.at(lastIndex+1) == '^') 
00525             {
00526                 lastIndex = value.find('>', lastIndex+1);
00527             }  
00528             //check size of pos
00529             if (pos>2)
00530             {   
00531                 errorParsing=true;  
00532                 break;      
00533             } 
00534             node[pos]= value.substr(0,lastIndex+1);
00535             pos++;
00536         }
00537         //blank, a variable, a relative predicate
00538         else if (value.at(0)=='_' || (value.find(":")!=string::npos))
00539         {
00540             lastIndex = value.find(" ");    
00541             //check size of pos
00542             if (pos>2)
00543             {
00544                 errorParsing=true;  
00545                 break;      
00546             }  
00547             node[pos]= value.substr(0,lastIndex);
00548             pos++;
00549         }
00550         //parameter or variable ---> obviate for Triples. In future, add to a Hash
00551         else if (value.at(0)=='@'|| value.at(0)=='?')
00552         {
00553             break;
00554         }
00555         // test if number 
00556         else
00557         {
00558             // else it is a parsing error
00559             lastIndex = value.find(" ");
00560             for (int j=0;j<lastIndex;j++)
00561             {
00562                 if (!isdigit(value.at(j))&&value.at(j)!='.'&&value.at(j)!=','){
00563                     errorParsing=true;  
00564                 }
00565             }
00566             
00567             if (errorParsing==false)
00568             {
00569                 node[pos]= value.substr(0,lastIndex);
00570                 pos++;
00571             }
00572             
00573             break;   
00574         }
00575         
00576         firstIndex = lastIndex+1;
00577     }
00578     
00579     if (errorParsing==true)
00580     {
00581         char* except = (char*)" :*********** FORMAT ERROR (NOT N3?) ***********"; 
00582         throw except;    
00583     }
00584     else if (pos!=0 && pos!=3)
00585     {
00586         char* except = (char*)" :*********** FORMAT ERROR (NOT N3?) ***********"; 
00587         throw except;
00588     }
00589 }

00591 
00592 StatsGen::~StatsGen()
00593 {
00594     delete header;
00595     delete dictionary;
00596     delete triples;
00597 }
Generated on Thu Feb 3 2011 09:46:45 for HDT-it by  1.7.1
